main.name: Quintin Nguyen
main.bio: First and foremost, "Hello World". When I printed out my first "Hello World", I knew coding would be the start of sleepless nights, nonstop head scratches, and lots of stack overflow, but in the end, something I would love forever. In all seriousness, the idea of implementing software to solve practical problems has really captivated me. For example, I built a Java program that helped me solve my chemistry homework with ease because I built-in a periodic table and some equations that I could use to solve in the click of a button. Programming is a never-ending puzzle that I am passionately engaged in solving. I believe that programming can be used to make the world a better place.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: B.S. in Computer Science, Software Engineering • May 2022

work.title: Technical Specialist
work.description1: • Performed troubleshooting, diagnosis, and repair of MacOS hardware and software for an average of 300 clients per month
work.description2: • Maintained an average customer service rating of 90% or higher in a fast-paced environment

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description1: • Revamped the internal clock-in and time-sheet system that increased workflow by a margin of 20
work.description2: • Developed a webhook based chat-bot, assisting both PMs and developers to remotely execute and share version control on chat
work.description3: • Implemented front-end features for the internal portal, actively accessed by 100+ clients

work.title: Mathematics Tutor
work.description1: • Tutored 3 individual high school students for their AP Computer Science Exams and they were able to score 4’s and 5’s
work.description2: • Designed rigorous study routines for students resulting in two students increasing their GPA by 20%

work.title: Technical Intern
work.description1: • Established an online presence through web development and social media that increased from 3 to 20 student volunteers
work.description2: • Revamped front-end features that enhanced user experience and increased site stickiness by 22%

projects.name: COVID-19 Tracker
projects.description1: Website designed to track COVID-19 cases using disease.sh API and display up to date reports using Hooks and Material Ui.

projects.name: Suicide Prevention Chat Bot
projects.description1: Implemented Natural Language Processing algorithms using python to determine if the caller is in need of the emergency National Suicide Prevention Hotline.
projects.description2: Developed the front-end website for the application from scratch using React over a 48 hour time period.

projects.name: Muddy Branch Trail Project
projects.description1: Mapped the Muddy Branch Trail using KeyHole Markup Language and Google Maps to be displayed on the public website.
projects.description2: Prevented the destruction of 3 local trails and 2 streams from being torn down and converted to road.
